text: @BetteMidler Just stop.  You & the liberal left are attempting to make CoronaVirus a partisan issue.  We ALL need to be united as Americans NOT Democrat or Republican.  A divided country cannot  be successful in fighting  a Pandemic.  STOP the partisan nonsense.
